abilities.description:
When you begin charging your omega cannon, set aside a d6 set to a value of 1 known as the omega die. When you have time to line up a devastating @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} with your omega cannon, you may add +omega die and mark progress on a hit a number of additional times equal to the charge/2 (rounded up). If you do, remove the omega die after resolving the @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike}.

If you make a move other than @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} while the omega cannon is charging, increase the value of the omega die by one. If the omega die is at a value of 6 when you would increase it or if the omega die increases above your mech’s integrity, the cannon overloads. Suffer -2 integrity and remove the omega die.
